# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#28)

#### Day 28

"But this . . . this isn't about blacksmithing, Perrin . . ."

"Of course it is," Perrin said. How could Rand not see that? (p. 174)
